Articles.Content:
Hello! I\'m Kojobs. My real name is Chris and I\'m from Poland. I really love this game and I\'m going to buy that awesome game! It\'s one of my favorite games I really love it. I tried to land at moon but it\'s a little hard with demo version I hope that I will spend nice time on that forum and in game and killikg kerbals.

Happy launching! Kojobs

P.S Sorry for my English. I know It\'s very poor

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Your English is just fine, no need to apologize. Now if your English was bad and you were a native English speaker, then you would need to apologize.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hello! I\'m Kojobs. My real name is Chris and I\'m from Poland. I really love this game and I\'m going to buy that awesome game! It\'s one of my favorite games I really love it. I tried to land at moon but it\'s a little hard with demo version I hope that I will spend nice time on that forum and in game and killikg kerbals.

Happy launching! Kojobs

P.S Sorry for my English. I know It\'s very poor

Welcome to the Forums Chris!

Nah you\'re english is fine And yeah in the beginning the Mun is really difficult, but one day we succeed and feel proud of our achievement.

I really think you\'ll enjoy the full version, alot more things than in the demo, I won\'t tell you much to keep the suspense (unless you already know :). Plus you\'re just in time! There\'s a release on the verge of being released, they\'re torturing our minds at the moment cause there\'s the experimental tests and they\'re being so silent.

Plus when you buy KSP you\'ll get any future release for free, including beta releases and the Final version. So all you\'ll have to do is just update in the meantime .

Happy Launching, and Landing!

Sorry for my English. I know It\'s very poor
No, it\'s really not. ;D (There are several other Poles on these boards, and they\'re all very polite! Must be a nice country.)
